topic: Case studies on the use of prompt shuffling in innovation processes
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that shuffling prompts can lead to unexpected insights and solutions by breaking habitual thinking patterns. As a next step, I will develop a system for regularly shuffling and combining prompts, possibly using a digital tool or app, and incorporate this practice into my brainstorming sessions. This will help me continuously explore diverse perspectives and enhance my creative problem-solving process.

metadata.trigger: If I shuffled my own prompts, what new ones emerge?
